summary:
This mod adds 10 Whiterun Guard Followers at jorrvaskr in Whiterun
They have sword / axe / bow to protect you.
And your followers never die.....
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS]                                        [color=#ff7700]  [size=5]  <Whiterun Guard Followers>[/size][/color]
This mod adds 10 [color=#ffd966]Whiterun[/color] Guard Followers at jorrvaskr in Whiterun,
>Now they're ready to be your gang members or your army  :)

[color=#e69138][size=3]=How to install=[/size][/color]
Drag all files in this winrar to Skyrim V folder.
such as = C:/Program Files/Bethesda Softworks/The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim../Data
*Don't forget to enable it by lancher.
[color=#e69138][size=3]=How to recruit them=[/size][/color]
Go to the jorrvaskr in Whiterun and then you will see them. They're sometimes inside or outside of jorrvaskr, go to talk with them.
[color=#e69138][size=3]=Recommended=
[/size][/color]Extensible Follower Framework mod [This mod make you easier to control your followers such as : stop follow relax(sit sleep cook etc.)]
here is the link : [color=#9fc5e8] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?   [/color][color=#efefef],or you can use other follower mods that you want :D[/color]

                                                                    [color=#000000]    

[/color]                                                                                                     [size=4]  [color=#e06666]H[/color][color=#ffff00]A[/color][color=#1e84cc]V[/color][color=#00ff00]E[/color] [color=#ff00ff]F[/color][color=#6aa84f]U[/color][color=#00ffff]N[/color][color=#ea9999]![/color][/size]
[/font][color=#ff0000] *sorry for my Englsih         [/color]                                                                                                                                                                       By:Eakanat
